short_summary: Local Access Service mandate, Ontario , Quebec
description: This contract proposes for a Local Access Service for the Government of Canada with offices located across Ontario and Quebec. The contract is managed by Shared Services Canada (SSC) and several Canadian-based companies could potentially qualify for securing a sub-contract to meet forecast demand. This mandate has a an initial term to run from the estimated contract start date of 31st December 2023 and is expected to run for approximately 10 years awarding opportunities to Canadian supply chain processes.
full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement
Local Access Service (Ontario and Quebec)
**Expand Contract Award Announcement (ECAN)**

**Tender ID**: PW-22-01017081
**Amendment ID**: 1
**Publication Date**: December 13, 2022
**Tender Closing Date**: December 27, 2022, 13:00:00 EST

**Contractor ID**: *D399B
**Contractor Description**: Telecommunications - Voice Service

**Contracting Entity**:
Services Shared Canada (SSC) is issuing a contract for Local Access Service (LAS) to the Government of Canada, covering offices in Ontario and Quebec.

**Notice Type**: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

**Notice Details**:
The contractor has been pre-selected to provide LAS services. The contractor will provide services to approximately 105,000 lines in Ontario and 30,000 lines in Quebec. The proposed services intend to start after the contract award.

**Contract Timelines**:
The contract is expected to begin on or before December 31, 2023, and shall be for up to ten years with option periods.

**Service Delivery**:
The proposed contractor, Bell Canada, intends to provide LAS services using wireless and Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) solutions. The contractor will be responsible for installing, maintaining, and updating all the infrastructure associated with delivering the service.

**Eligibility Criteria**:
To demonstrate the ability to fulfill the requirements, interested suppliers must provide a statement of capabilities that includes evidence of:
* 10 years of experience in providing complex local access services to clients with multiple locations
* 5 years of experience in providing local access services within the specified geographic areas
* 5 years of in supporting at least 50% of the volume of total local access lines in the applicable geographic region

**Security Requirement**:
This contract requires vendor and personnel security screening.

**Procurement Contact**:
Jean-Charles St-Onge
Procurement Team Leader, SSC

Telephone: (613) 618-0167
Email: Jean-Charles.St-Onge@ssc-spc.gc.ca
